meanings.definition: A person or thing that converts something.
meanings.sent1: The converter helped me change my old VHS tapes into digital files.
meanings.sent2: I used a currency converter to find out how much my money is worth in another country.
meanings.sent3: The toaster became a converter, turning bread into crispy toast.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a converter, transforming his bad mood into happiness.
meanings.sent5: The magical converter turned the pumpkin into a carriage for Cinderella.

meanings.definition: A device that changes the form of something.
meanings.sent1: The voltage converter adjusted the power supply for the electronic device.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a video converter to play the movie on my old TV.
meanings.sent3: The shape-shifting converter toy amazed the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The time machine was a converter, altering the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The weather converter machine could turn rain into sunshine.

meanings.definition: A program that changes the format of a file.
meanings.sent1: I used a file converter to change the document into a PDF.
meanings.sent2: The image converter software helped me resize the pictures for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The text converter app turned all my messages into emojis.
meanings.sent4: The data converter was like a language translator for the computer.
meanings.sent5: The audio converter magically transformed the song into a different genre.
